title: ShotBreakdown — Video Analytics Platform
summary: Basketball analytics app with synced video, real-time filtering, and on-court performance insights.
highlights: Synced video playback with analytics overlays
Role-based access for coaches and staff

content.text: ShotBreakdown replaces manual spreadsheets with a fast, visual analytics platform for player development. Coaches can filter by shooting context, compare outcomes, and review synced video—right on the court.

items: Data model for shot types, zones, and contexts
Synced video playback for frame-by-frame breakdown

content.text: Vue reactivity + cloud-hosted video enables near-instant review with minimal backend load. TailwindCSS ensures responsive UI while Google Identity Services secures coach access. ECharts and Chart.js drive analytics.
